name: Hello! My name is Samuel Demirdjian.
body:
- A senior web developer in the morning
- An IT manager / Systems administrator at night
- Married to a wonderful wife
- Blessed with beautiful children
- A follower of Jesus Christ

You can find hereunder my personal projects:

![aurora](//enov.github.io/aurora.png)
![orchestra](//enov.github.io/orchestra.png)
![exponent](//enov.github.io/exponent.png)
![rachel](//enov.github.io/rachel.png)
![axios](//enov.github.io/axios.png)

***

I am also:

- A maintainer of the Kohana project
- An active contributor (or have contributed at least once) to the following projects:
  - tommcdo/kohana-twig
  - p3drosola/Backbone.VirtualCollection
